contents: A filibuster can be an effective way to draw attention to a senator’s position or raise awareness of a bill. Supporters of filibusters note that they force compromise, instead of giving complete power to whichever party has 51 senators. _____(4)_____ Some reformers _____(5)_____ Senate rules to only allow “talking filibusters,” where minority senators would be required to speak to the Senate throughout the length of the filibuster in order to prevent a vote.
